title: Have been playing for 5 years now
text:
I absolutely love this game it’s so fun. I love how it starts of very slow and continues to get faster and faster! I also love the fact that while your playing you also have challenges. They just had there 10 year birthday and I was like holy crap because I have been playing for 5 years and the fact that it’s been out for ten I was just surprise but happy belated birthday. This game is a very big success and the only thing I can say is that we all don’t like ads but the good thing is that they have very few and you can get something like 600 coins for 1 ad (example) and hey that’s pretty good because some games you need to watch 5 ads so hey. But this is a very good game and keep up the great work for this! 
(I also like watching the episodes sometimes)

title: Surfing to success!!!

title: ppl are just being too sensitive
text: honestly this is a really good game! it’s really fun and takes your mind off things. what i don’t like is anyone who is giving this game a one star review just because of pride month. they are being sensitive for no reason. they are the loud majority in the world and just when the quiet minority gets some attention, they go bezerk and don’t know how to behave. they act like a bunch of little kids, it’s a 20 day update get over yourself. i think everyone should have this game because it’s so fun and knocks the nerves away. to anyone in the LGBTQ+ community, i hear you and i support you. im sorry for any hate you receive. people shouldn’t have double standards. there is so much more i could say about people being so rude to anyone who has individuality. ✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️

title: Game is awesome but minor issue🙂
text: This game is really fun. And the new update is great. I mean now everything is organized like with the character organization of alphabetical, default or owned. And new colors. But I have some ideas and improvements. To begin with, for the characters you should include a little blurb about them. Also, I don’t have facebook but I really want to have the account so you should let everyone do it even if they don’t have an account. And how come whenever one of the seasons ends you make everyone wait another day to see the new season. Why not just do it right away? And can you not make people wait another 24 hours for another stage for the tag time event. Please 🙏 read and try to make these ideas happen. And one more thing. Can you guys do a sports theme and a girl baseball player character. Or a Hanukkah theme 🕎. Thx

title: Thumbs up
text: Praise for Subway! Thank you for all the updates! You care that your viewers get a change! 😍😍😍🥰🥰🥰 thank you all of subway So much you lowered down costs on characters and boards, and 1 suggestion: I think that when you are in a season hunt and you reach the tenth tier! You have to wait a day or less to finish it up. Another suggestion: Please make the keys 🔑 more in the run. I have only a few, and it took me YEARS to get 5000 keys, so if you can make them more common. Last suggestion: when the  character you selected is doing graffiti, you give not only me but all viewers a pop up ad and it’s getting on my 😬. Other than that though, subway surfers is a great game to play with friends who have Subway too! Thanks Subway! Thank you for everyone reading this! Sincerely, Unknown.

title: Amazing game 1 suggestion
text:
So.... I absolutely love this game and it’s fun and addictive for me (in a good way) but there’s something about this game that I want you to know. It’s that all the items/important stuff: keys, characters, (etc) are hard to get.? . By that I mean like... the characters; as soon as you get further into the game you need a kind of excessive amount of that character’s item and with the keys; I know it’s kind of supposed to be the difficulty of the game but I don’t really like the way that the amount of keys that you need to revive increases every time you die again (after you pay the keys and die again) until you can’t really afford it anymore. I know this may just be the difficulty of the game (again) but it’s just kind of frustrating. Anyways, I love the game and it’s amazing 😉 thanks for listening 😃

-Anonymous/ supercat_8762

title: I love this but.. few problems

I haven’t played in a while but I’m pretty sure the update thing is still here, also their should be customizable characters maybe you could  make them your style ( just a recommendation) also, I think their should be something called subway surfers live were you could play with friends in duo and trio!(just recommending) one more problem is it’s the same thing over and over you just go faster maybe at different decor and tracks when you beat your high score ? Other then those things it’s fun, the intensity, the characters, too the themes they make! I love it. Hope this helps!

title: Unable to Properly Migrate Data
text: I loved this game! I’d been playing it for years, and just recently deleted it. I really wasn’t planning on getting it back, but I just felt like playing it again. Then I try to get my old save back. Hours upon hours of grind for skins, hoverboards, and more all lost because my data can’t be transferred from the cloud. I have no idea why this happened, or why I can’t get it back, but I hope I’ll be helping somebody else by telling them that once you delete the game, you most likely won’t get anything you’ve collected back. I tried refreshing, I tried resetting my phone, I tried to get help from others. But somehow it’s like my data never existed! It’s like I’ve never played the game! Don’t get me wrong, I enjoyed this game as muck as anyone else, but it loses its fun when you’re back to square one after you've been playing at such a high level for so long. I hope that this won’t be the end of the game for me, and I hope this won’t be the end of my data either.

title: #best game ever
text: This is the best game ever I was so happy when I found this game because it is the only game I have ever download that I never get tired of and I never get bored on it and it is always coming up with new skins that I love getting and I love unlocking new boards and new characters and I love finding out what medal i accomplished so I think that if your bored and and you can never find a good game you should definitely go to the App Store and download subway surfers right now and you will not believe that this game is actually free because I heave 103 games on my phone and this is by far the very best game I have ever downloaded so you should go ahead and download subway surfers if you haven’t already because this is going to be the very best game you have ever played and if you ever get bored that would be a great time to download subway surfers

title: one star :\
text:
So I am giving subway surfers one star solely because I am very very mad that one afternoon i hop on to play the game and i see that almost ALL of my stuff were deleted. See I’m talking about my keys, I used to have 160 now I have 46 😱. And I used to have about 170k coins now I have 35k LIKE WHERE DID IT ALL GO?!?! And I also used to have about 70 hoverboards now I have 41! Let me not get started on my characters... I used to own Tasha, Fresh, Lucy ( good i still have her ) and the starting guy ( name I forgot ) and also my hoverboards, I bought the super speed hoverboard (I don’t remember its exact name but i got that ) and about 3 other basic ones now of which I don’t have. And also my high score of 1.4 mil has been reduced to about 48k 🤦‍♀️. I am very disappointed that this game has done this to me,  was a huge fan of this game but now I’m not so sure. If it wasn’t for all this complications, I would’ve gave it 5 stars. However, I am very upset and angry on what this game has done to my score and I just don’t know how to fix it. I hope this can be fixed :/ 
~ a fellow player, Kelechi O.

title: Good game and should be shared to others
text:
This is the best game ever! Before my sister moved out she would always let me play this game on her phone. When I got my own phone which was about 3 and a half months ago the first game I wanted was this one. I don’t have any problems with this game. It even allows YOU to CHOOSE if you WANT to. You get to choose if you want to watch an add to double up or get more advantages. Other games make you watch an add and you don’t get anything. If you press the menu or home screen a tiny add will be there but you can press the ‘x’ immediately. You should have this game for the following reasons...!!

1. It’s a very addictive game great for when you want some time AWAY from adds.

2. You can get many different characters and some are for limited time witch gets your heart racing and will make you want to play more. 

3. And in the game as you are running there are quite a few power ups but the game gets faster very quick so the power ups are definitely a handy material. 

Again I’m extremely happy with this game and always have been.  I hope this game stays in app purchases for one of my kids one days so they can play this too. Plus by then we probably won’t have phones anymore but still you should check it out!!!💋

title: An amazing game, fun for a long car ride!!
text:
This game is super fun, great for long periods of time when there’s nothing to do. I play it in the car on the way to see family and it is amazing.

‼️🚨APP DESIGNER PLEASE READ🚨‼️
I have an  idea for a challenge and it might be hard to develop but it would be fun. 

What if you could race with other players… like you would enter into the “Run Together” challenge and you would run the same track at the same time with other members of the game.
 It would be like one of those car games at an arcade. You could see the other players running with you.
 If you get caught the only way to come back is keys or one video. There are also power ups like normal but each one can only be collected by two people. There are 5 people running at a time. 
There are waiting rooms for races and you can do other challenges or the regular run and you'll get notified when your available to run. You can click the notification and enter your race. 
The winners after 3 races will compete and that winner can win keys or money or a special character/board. Then the races start over.

This might sound like a lot but it would get more people on the game and would just be great in general.

title: Fantastic, just a few things...
text: I love this game, and it is super fun and addictive!! I do have a few complaints about the game and that is, I have had this game for about two months now, and the majority of the time, I am in one place!!!! Please please make it so we switch places more often. Another thing is that everything about this game is basically revolving around Facebook!!!!!!! I am only thirteen and I don’t think I’ll ever be getting Facebook. I would like to collect my coins for my 3 million high score but I can’t because of Facebook!!!!😭 And the last thing I really recommend putting in the next update, is when I have a power up, the super sneakers, for example, I have them one moment and then  the next I ran into a train thinking I still had the power up. I think this would be super helpful. Thank you sooo much this game is incredible and perfect except for these few things this game would be perfect and it would get five stars

title: Ok game🤨
text:
Ok, so the first time I played this, I wuz like, obsessed, That lasted for a month. But then, I figured out that the tracks repeat itself endlessly and the new features are the same as the last but they just look different and have different background music, you also have to watch sooooooo many ads if you wanna just get a hoverboard, and the characters are ✨aesthetic✨, but you have to pay for all the good ones, then there are so many bugs, after an ad finishes, the arrow to leave never shows up, so I have to get out of the app, restart my phone, so I can play again🙄. But I guess that’s what you get for a semi free app. Oh, and like, it’s so annoying when you like, accidentally crash into the wall, and then that cop comes up to you, like, I’m 👐sorry🙌 but like, it’s so annoying, maybe fix that if u crash into the wall you don’t get damaged, other than that, the game is fine🤌

👀
👄

title: PLEASE READ
text:
Hiya! First of all thank you for reading! I will try not to have to many spelling mistakes. Second of all this app is what you would expect, you Run jump and collect characters/boards. To make a long story short I'mma cut to the chase (get it? Subway surfers is a chasing game :)) 
Anyway, the game is fun and it passes time. For me a good game is a game that doesn't have adds and doesn't drain battery now I have a phone that's been passed down through 2 people so it's old. Making it so almost all apps with adds drain my battery yet this app doesn't. Adds only come once and awhile AND when you get prizes for them. Great app highly suggest. 

Now for the creators I have one suggestion. 

Nowadays popular apps are ones that stick with the trends, so I was thinking and I thought that what if you made a character with a special skill, and a board to pair with it. Now what would be the characters theme? Signs, Scorpios, Gemini, Aquarius. A character and a skateboard for each sign. Both only 50,000 coins each? It is affordable and everyone will have their "sign"! It would be so cool to run away from the police in my style/my sign. Please try and add that to the game 

Other than that TOTALLY GET THIS GAME! 

Warmest regards, 
App rater

title: Okay..this has good points
text:
I love this game, do not get me wrong. But the thing is if you have a really good score the week before, IT ALL GOES AWAY THE NEXT WEEK!!! I Also think this game should have a save game feature because if you are in a game and you have a HUGE score, and your device shuts down by accident, or even just turns off you lose all your progress!! To add on to that point, they should have some sort of button to press when you have to go and you are in the middle of a run, so when you have to go, you press the button and it saves the run so you can go back into the game another time. I also think that this games characters are a little over priced.  But that’s all I have to say on the negative side of things. But on the positive side, this game is an amazing pass time if you want to spend some mindless time in quarantine. It is also overall just really fun. So to conclude I do recommend this game 

Your reviewer,
   Jack

title: Subway surfers
text: You  should get subway surfers for many reasons. One reason fun to play in the car because you are bored and need something to do. Another reason you can challenge others that are with you to see who can run a father distance or see who can get the most coins. Also in the game you can earn boxes that give you stuff to get new  surfers or characters , get letters while you are in a run and build words that get you stuff, or even just in a run you can run into a box and get stuff out of it when you get out. It tells you your high score after the run you got it on. It keeps track of the high score, the amount of coins you get and earn. It also keeps track of the surfers or characters you get and the surf boards you earn or get

title: A few suggestions
text:
Hey. I absolutely love your game it’s my go to app. However after playing it so much I have noticed a couple things that would make it much more fun. 

Being able to cancel power ups. 
It’s as easy as a tiny x next to them. Sometimes I’ll be trying to complete a mission, like gold is useless, and with super shoes pick up a magnet. 

It would also be fun if the camera followed the character like when you have double jump, or you could play in first person. 
These could be turned off in settings of course. 

You could add the cop as a playable character. 
That way you could play with your friends and also have a way to win if the cop crashes. But you could also play with the bot if you wanted the endless runner

For those of us without Facebook please make a way for us to play with the people around us, especially if you add the cop. I could play with my little sister who doesn’t have Facebook. 

Also it would be really fun if you had two friends that played together and you could see each other’s characters on your own screens. 

Maybe make a texture pack icon where you can choose to play in previous updates. 

Thank you for considering these updates.

title: One Of The Classics
text: I have played this game for 7 years already and I never once did get bored of it. There are always new updates, new characters to unlock, new boards to try, and so much more. Now this is still a mobile game so it is pretty straight forward but Subway Surfers just has a certain charm to it. Now I may be wrong but this might the first out of MANY infinite runner games which just makes it even better. If you are ever just bored in a waiting room or car ride you can just pull out that phone and play for a bit. So even when you have a little free time you should play this game. Heck, even if you have tons of free time there is a lot to do, unlock, and collect in this game. The only problem with the game is simply it crashes sometimes. Besides that pretty great for a mobile game. 8/10

title: What I do and do not like about Subway Surfers
text: I do like Subway Surfers, it’s a pretty fun endless runner game. Some things that are fun about are collecting tokens for the season hunt because it makes the game interesting, I also like the world tours and switching from place to place every time the hunt ends. I like getting a high score too, it makes me feel like I accomplished a hard mission whenever I get a new high score. Even though there are some downsides of the game, like why does Prince K cost 980,000 coins? That’s ridiculous! The logic in the game also kind of doesn’t make sense, like I understand that a magnet attracts coins, but not the super sneakers. Also the cop that chases you when you start the game, how can he catch up to you so fast?he’s mad fat! Overall though I do like the game.

title: We R all subway Surfers
text: There once was a child who loved subway surfers, however he stopped playing the game due to the high character prices. then 2-3 years later, he returns to immerse himself in the world and land of subway surfers. This child was me. After years and years of not playing, I’ve returned with a new life view. And I can, with upfront confidence. SUBWAY SURFERS RULES!!! It’s got all the action you would expect and more. I like the concepts behind the story. There is so much implied yet so little explored. I would love more world building in the subway surfers app. I also love the sounds. I’ve been deaf since I was a kid, when I came back to this glorious game, the wonders of technology allowed me to hear my favorite sounds of my childhood again, for the first time. Thank you for reading and I love you. 4/10 please download on your iPad

title: Great game but one problem
text: Subway Surfers has been one of my favorite games for a while now, and I’ve loved all the characters and maps and everything but I do have an issue with the rankings. So as you know there is like bronze, silver, gold, diamond, and champion. I’m currently the highest person in silver, but every time I run to beat the people in gold, I have to go all the way back to the bronze people and beat them all over again. I don’t think that I should have to do this, because I already beat them so what is the point of me doing it again. I think we shouldn’t have to do that and just start of the person in front of us so we can move higher, and we can focus of who we are trying to beat. Please read this and change it. Thank you!

title: Ads stuff and problems
text:
Hey Subway Surfers Developers,
   I really love this game and I always play it in my free time all day. While the game is really good, there is a few problems. First of all, I like to play the game but then I get the urge to play another game or I have to go to sleep and I close out of the app, and then when I open it either later or the next day, it erases all of my progress I’ve been working on and I have to start all over again. Also, if I run into a train and lose, sometimes the ads won’t work and when I try to use my keys, it also won’t work and I have to get out of the game and get rid of it and go into it again and ruin my hard work. So if you could somehow fix those few problems it would be great for me and everyone else who plays this game. As always, thank you for your time.

title: super great game for passing time
text:
okay subway surfers is just such a great game first off it is endless, which lets me kill time whenever and there is a small reward medal thing where you compete and that is fun as well, but one of my favorite parts about this app is that you can use it without wifi. like that is great you can play it when you're camping or hiking or on a road trip or anything. I also like just buying new avatars for myself when I have emough money. of course there are a couple ads, but absolutely not as worse as some other games like maybe once every 3 hours automatically but subway surfers is a great game. I recommend to any age because it is really easy to learn and once you get the hang of it the game is super fun. have fun playing!

-faeriegalaxy

title: Deleted my challenge progress multiple times.
text: If I could give this game a one star I would. I have wasted hours on this game trying to unlock the challenge skins all for the game to delete my progress. The worst part about this is that the game deleted my progress after high score making runs. The first time it happened, I lost all of my skins (including rare ones that were only for events like Mike the Transylvania surfer and Eddy the New Orleans surfer as well as my Transylvania board). After that, my attempt at the new Fresh skin came short on the third page after a 2.5M point run followed by a wipe of my progress, and then another wipe of my progress after a 3.9M point run. At least I have the board now but how am I supposed to get the skin when it clears my progress any time that I do well? Am I supposed to just play the challenge 3-4 times just to get the full way without it erasing my progress? I have no idea what is going on and atp I am so frustrated with this game that I am writing this review now.

title: Good, but not perfect for me
text: I love this game, so this is a great game but I don’t know if it’s good for me. I think it’s a great game and very fun and addictive to play, but also I don’t know if it’s the game for me. If you are under 8 it’s super amazing and addictive, but for anyone older it’s not as addictive or fun. I have been playing for about 6 or 7 years. There are no updates that really change the game or make it more fun, so I get very bored of it. But as I said if your under 8 you will be so in love with this game. After the 1st year I gave up and stoped playing, then I seen an update and started playing again. Then I realized there is no update and it’s the same boring game. So play it and see how you like it, but I get very bored. Plz, take some of my suggestions and change it up a little bit.

title: All the reasons Why you should download this game

title: Needed improvement
text:
This game is great in all, but what is with the adds? I just tap play and 20+ adds come on! One thing that will be very cool is to design a character for FREE. I mean why does all of the “special” characters have a TIME LIMIT??? Also, why is everything so expensive?!?! Why is it soooo many keys or 
soooo many coins? Huh?!? You just want the money! There are so many glitches and annoying things! When I swipe it jumps! When I jump it rolls, AND IF I ROLL IT CLOSES THE GAME, I MEAN WTH.!! Also when your running why does there have to be 2 trains and no way to escape! It makes it hard to beat a high score!!! You also have to do something with the police officer! It’ll be cool if can dress him up for FREE. Also when running who maybe should keep the dog behind you so it’s not that easy to just run. Also why is there graffiti in the beginning!? That is such a bad influence on little kids! There parents can go to jail! Also when running when it says to roll you have to jump! Ughhh!!!!

title: Poop…jk
text: This game is really fun in in so many ways! 1. Every month there is a new location and with that location different events and things to look for 2. There are so many different characters to choose from and they are  a reasonable price 3. You don’t have to pay for nearly anything which is amazing! You only have to pay for extra stuff that you don’t actually need.4.  There are so many prizes you can get without doing anything and just by watching one add you can get so much. I guess what I’m trying to say is is thank you for this game that I have been playing sync I was a little kid because I’ve always thought this game was so much fun and can keep you entertained forever so thank you again for everything thing you have done for me!

title: AMAZING but a good suggestion
text: Ok so I’ve had this game for like 3 years and it’s AMAZING best game ever I love it but when I buy new characters and boards there really expensive like I have to do my runs like 10 times before I can get it and I like the challenge and it’s really fun but please make the characters and boards less expensive like I got Ella and she’s great but she’s like 500,000 game dollars and that toke me like 2 days just for a dumb game character and that’s a waste of time soooo please drop the prices on the character and the boards don’t get me started there too EXPENSIVE for me they don’t even do anything I barely need to use them and when I started I thought they were amazing and saved your life but now there just there’s dumb things that you barely use but I still think the games AMAZING just please drop the prices Thank you BYEEEE

title: NO UNNECESSARY ADDS!! 🥳
text: I love this game so much!!! One of the main things that makes this game amazing is that it doesn’t have any unnecessary adds. All of the other games that I have have adds in between levels. This game has no levels, and it easy to see your ranking compared to other players. Although you can’t play with others. I think that would be a good thing to add. People should be able to race against each other and see who can survive the longest. I also like that you can see the leaderboard without logging into some kind of social media. You see, I don’t have social media, and I think that you should just be able to play and see others’ scores with just your Apple ID that u use to play the game. This game does just that. It is super addictive and I love it. PLS KEEP MAKING GAMES AS AWESOME AS THIS ONE!!!! 😄😄😄😄😄

title: Amazing! Love the game❤️
text:
This game is so amazing! It’s definitely my favorite offline game. The challenges are also really fun and the  game is just amazing 🤩 I usually don’t write reviews but I really like this game and thought I should write a review on it. 

All in all this is a great game but I have one suggestion that I think would help improve the game.  Could the creators add a mission  like “ground is lava”? Where you have to go so long without touching the ground like 30 seconds or something? That would be so much fun. 
Also if anyone who doesn’t like this game like saying it’s dumb or boring, don’t let that stop you from downloading this game. If you don’t like it, delete it. It’s that simple. You don’t have to write a bad review just delete t he game and let it go. 
That’s about all I have to say. Thank you subway surfers for such a good game 😊🤩

title: Love it- one thing tho!
text: Ok so I love this game! I first got it on my iPad and have been playing it for a while now. I spent my coins on cool characters and stuff and thats where the problem comes in. Firstly, I think you should be able to create an account without Facebook, because some people (including me) are not allowed to have social media so we cant sync our characters between devices if we wanted to. Other than that I love Subway Surfers and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a rewarding game that is fun and challenging at the same time (challenging because of the speeds you can get to!) warning: it could be addictive but if you monitor yourself it is fine. If any parents are reading this, you should definitely let your child get Subway Surfers. Thanks for reading my review!! 😊😊 😁😌 🏃‍♀️ 🚂

title: Bring back the old design
text:
I used to love playing this game all the time back in 2013. I’d stopped for some time but finally redownloaded it in quarantine. It was quite nostalgic seeing the app virtually the same as how I remembered it in 2013. But this update is an absolute mess. The graphics look so childish, I couldn’t believe how big of a downgrade it was. And to make it worse, the game lags on my iPhone XS Max even though it was fine on the previous update. I really regret not having read reviews but this update’s taught me a valuable lesson that newer is certainly not necessarily better. Please bring back the classic design. Based on the other reviews, it’s fairly clear no one likes this horrendous overhaul. And please fix the lagging, it’s hard to play when the frames glitch out ever other lane change. If you’re a player reading this, DO NOT UPDATE! It’s not worth it by a long shot. Once things are fixed, I’ll give the classic version of the game the five stars it deserves, as opposed to the current garbage.

EDIT: Still haven’t fixed the graphics
